description: Gwen Diamond runs a tight security check point at the airport - no gels, liquids and certainly no fucking machines. When Naomi - a conservative business woman tries to sneak a few contra ban items through - she is quickly escorted to secondary where Gwen makes sure she inspects and tests every kinky thing this naughty passenger is carrying. First the violet wand gets Naomi's attention as it searches her arms, legs and chest before Gwen pounds her pussy with The Fucksall. It quickly becomes clear that Naomi is not too disappointed with the cavity searching that will have her in secondary inspection for the rest of the afternoon. The two enjoy a double ended ride on The Little Guy before moving on to some big gun pounding and double penetration.
title: No liquids or machines
